slate-action-addsection:
Used in the Slate skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=slate}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}
slate-action-delete:
Used in the Slate skin, as the name of a tab at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=slate}}

{{Identical|Delete}}
slate-action-move:
Used in the Slate skin, on the tabs at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=slate}}

{{Identical|Move}}
slate-action-protect:
Tab at top of page, in slate skin

{{Identical|Protect}}
slate-action-undelete:
Tab at top of page, in slate skin.
{{Identical|Undelete}}
slate-action-unprotect:
Tab at top of page, in slate skin.
{{Identical|Change protection}}
slate-view-create:
Tab label in the Slate skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Foo|useskin=slate}}
{{Identical|Create}}
slate-view-edit:
Tab label in the Slate skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=slate}}
{{Identical|Edit}}
slate-view-history:
Tab label in the Slate skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=slate}}
{{Identical|View history}}
slate-view-view:
Tab label in the Slate skin (verb). See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=slate}}.
{{Identical|Read}}
slate-view-viewsource:
Tab label in the Slate skin.
{{Identical|View source}}
slate-more-actions: Label in the Slate skin's menu for the less-important or rarer actions which are not shown as tabs (like moving the page, or for sysops deleting or protecting the page), as well as (for users with a narrow viewing window in their browser) the less-important tab actions which the user's browser is unable to fit in. {{Identical|More}}
